But the region also has a strong advanced materials footprint, he said, thanks to the University of Waterloo and McMaster University, home to the federally funded CanmetMATERIALS research center, which has a mandate of developing and deploying technologies to improve all aspects of producing and using value-added products derived from metals and minerals.
